content: Drowsy Cloudlet
Cherry Blossom Beaches
Pinecone Constellations
Pawprint Sigil
Shimmering Seas
Dragonstone Reef
Crimsoncloud Cliffs
Starlined Meadows
Bamboo Brooks
Decorates the planet's grasslands with patterns of stars.
Adorns the planet's beaches with gentle hues, where sand as fine as salt scatters along the shore.
Decorates the sky with pinecone-shaped constellations, gleaming like enormous billboards hung among the stars.
Paints the planet's cliffs in hues of rosy sunset clouds.
Adorns the waves with glimmers of light, making every step echo with the romance of the sea.
Decorates the planet's sky with cute paw-shaped stars, like tiny footprints left while strolling above.
Decorates the planet's reefs with dreamy colors, as if shaped by ancient creatures and layered through time.
Decorates the planet's sky with clouds shaped like fluffy sheep-horn plushies.
Oasis Mirage
Transforms the planet's rivers into bamboo brooks with green stones.
Decorates the planet's seas with an elusive, ever-changing mirage of desert oases.
Mountainlush Meadows
Decorates the planet's grasslands with special dreamlike colors.
Starbloom Meadows
Decorates the planet's meadows with patterns of flower buds and scattered stars.
